openadk.util
Class XMLNodeReader

java.lang.Object
  openadk.util.XMLNodeReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamConstants, javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader
public class XMLNodeReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader

Wraps an XMLStreamReader and reads only the current element and it's children

Version:
2.1
Author:
Andrew Elmhorst
